text: avarkal umakku cevi cayttal enna nokkattutan cevi caykkirarkal enpatai nam nankarivom. Avarkal (tankalukkul um'maip parri) irakaciyamakap pecikkontal, â€œcuniyattirkullana manitanait tavira (veroruvaraiyum) ninkal pinparravillai'' enru ivvakkiramakkararkal (nampikkaiyalarkalai nokkik) kurukinranar (enpataiyum nam nankarivom)
